alert.note: Alert for Cook; Lake (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 20 at 11:40PM CDT until June 21 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN COOK AND NORTHERN LAKE COUNTIES... At 1139 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Boundary Waters Canoe Area Wilderness, to 7 miles north of Clear Lake, to near Illgen City, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Gunflint Lake, Clear Lake, Lutsen, Saganaga Lake, Dumbbell Lake, Sea Gull Lake, Snowbank Lake, southeastern Boundary Waters Canoe Area Wilderness, Whyte, Forest Center, Little Saganaga Lake, Alpine Lake, Isabella, Basswood Lake, Ensign Lake, Bald Eagle Lake, Ojibway Lake, Phoebe Lake, Kawishiwi Lake, and Isabella Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
